edu.ucla.sspace.dv

Class MediumMiniparTemplateAcceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.dv.MediumMiniparTemplateAcceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DependencyPathAcceptor

    public class MediumMiniparTemplateAcceptor
extends Object
implements DependencyPathAcceptor
    A DependencyPathAcceptor that accepts the minimum set of path templates specified by Pad√≥ and Lapata (2007). This acceptor is designed to be used with the Minipar parser and its associated part of speech tag set.
    See Also:
    MinimumMiniparTemplateAcceptor, MaximumMiniparTemplateAcceptor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MediumMiniparTemplateAcceptor()
      Creates the acceptor with its standard templates

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accepts(DependencyPath path)
      Returns true if the path matches one of the predefined templates

      Returns the maximum path length allowed by this acceptor.
